section.section: The Advisory Committee consists of nine members.

Of the nine members:
three shall be from Somerset County;
three shall be from Wicomico County; and
three shall be from Worcester County.
The governing body of each county shall appoint the members from that county.

text.section: Each member of the Advisory Committee shall be a member of the general public and reside in the county from which the member is appointed.

section.section: The term of a member is 5 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Advisory Committee on October 1, 2008.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: The governing body that appointed a member may remove the member for incompetence or misconduct.
